ComicInfo.Title: Blurred; Everything and Nothing; Plan B
ComicInfo.Summary:
The team behind the New York Times bestselling and Eisner-nominated smash hit THE WICKED + THE DIVINE return to the acclaimed urbanfantasy where they first made their names. Nearly a decade ago, Emily Aster sold half her personality for the power to rule a coven of phonomancers. Iâ€™m sure nothing could go horribly, monstrously wrong now. In a world where Music is Magic, a song can save or ruin your life. In THE IMMATERIAL GIRL, we discover what a video can do.
*Notes:* The cover is a homage based off of the album cover of Duran Duran's Rio.
ComicInfo.Characters: Indie Dave,Lloyd,Emily Aster,The King Behind the Screen,Seth Bingo,David Kohl,Lady Vox,The Myth,Shambles
